name: Nike
description: A multinational corporation that is engaged in the design, development, manufacturing, and worldwide marketing and sales of footwear, apparel, equipment, accessories, and services.

name: Adidas
description: A multinational corporation, founded and headquartered in Herzogenaurach, Germany, that designs and manufactures shoes, clothing, and accessories.

name: Puma
description: A German multinational corporation that designs and manufactures athletic and casual footwear, apparel, and accessories.

name: Reebok
description: An American-inspired global brand with a deep fitness heritage and a clear mission: To be the best fitness brand in the world.
